content: I'll definitely look into those tour operators and travel companies. Another thing I'm thinking about is how to make the most of my solo travel experience. In the past, I've found that solo travel can be really empowering and confidence-boosting, but it also means I have to navigate unfamiliar streets and transportation systems on my own, which can be challenging. Do you have any tips on how to overcome language barriers and navigate unfamiliar places as a solo traveler?
